mockups.content:
# UI/UX Mockups for Basic App

## 1. Welcome/Onboarding Screen

**Purpose:** This screen serves as the entry point to the application, welcoming users and providing a brief introduction to the app's purpose. Since the app's specific functionality is undefined, this screen is designed to be adaptable to various purposes while maintaining a clean, intuitive interface.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="360" height="640" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  
  <!-- App Logo/Icon -->
  <circle cx="180" cy="180" r="70" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="180" y="195" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Basic App</text>
  
  <!-- Welcome Text -->
  <text x="180" y="300" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Welcome to Basic App</text>
  <text x="180" y="330" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Your simple solution for everyday tasks</text>
  
  <!-- Get Started Button -->
  <rect x="80" y="400" width="200" height="50" rx="25" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="180" y="430" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Get Started</text>
  
  <!-- Login Option -->
  <text x="180" y="480" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Already have an account? Log in</text>
  
  <!-- Version Info -->
  <text x="180" y="620" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">Version 1.0.0</text>
</svg>
```

## 2. Home Screen

**Purpose:** The home screen provides users with access to the app's main features. This design incorporates a clean layout with navigation elements and placeholders for content that can be customized based on the app's eventual purpose.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Status Bar -->
  <rect width="360" height="24" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="20" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white">9:41 AM</text>
  <text x="340" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white" text-anchor="end">100%</text>
  
  <!-- Header -->
  <rect y="24" width="360" height="56" fill="white"/>
  <text x="20" y="60" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Home</text>
  <circle cx="330" cy="52" r="15" fill="#f5f7fa" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="330" y="57" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">👤</text>
  
  <!-- Search Bar -->
  <rect x="20" y="100" width="320" height="40" rx="20" fill="#f5f7fa" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="50" y="125" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#999">Search...</text>
  <circle cx="35" cy="120" r="8" stroke="#999" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
  <line x1="41" y1="126" x2="46" y2="131" stroke="#999" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Feature Cards -->
  <rect x="20" y="160" width="155" height="120" rx="10" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="97.5" cy="200" r="25" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="97.5" y="205" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">📊</text>
  <text x="97.5" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature 1</text>
  
  <rect x="185" y="160" width="155" height="120" rx="10" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="262.5" cy="200" r="25" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="262.5" y="205" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">📝</text>
  <text x="262.5" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature 2</text>
  
  <rect x="20" y="290" width="155" height="120" rx="10" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="97.5" cy="330" r="25" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="97.5" y="335" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">📅</text>
  <text x="97.5" y="380" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature 3</text>
  
  <rect x="185" y="290" width="155" height="120" rx="10" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="262.5" cy="330" r="25" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <text x="262.5" y="335" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">⚙️</text>
  <text x="262.5" y="380" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature 4</text>
  
  <!-- Recent Activity Section -->
  <text x="20" y="440" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Recent Activity</text>
  
  <rect x="20" y="460" width="320" height="60" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="60" y="485" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Activity Item 1</text>
  <text x="60" y="505" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999">2 hours ago</text>
  <circle cx="35" cy="490" r="10" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  
  <rect x="20" y="530" width="320" height="60" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="60" y="555" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Activity Item 2</text>
  <text x="60" y="575" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999">Yesterday</text>
  <circle cx="35" cy="560" r="10" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  
  <!-- Bottom Navigation -->
  <rect y="600" width="360" height="40" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="60" y="625" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">Home</text>
  <text x="180" y="625" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">Explore</text>
  <text x="300" y="625" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">Profile</text>
</svg>
```

## 3. Feature Detail Screen

**Purpose:** This screen displays detailed information about a specific feature or content item. The design includes a header with navigation, content area, and action buttons, allowing for customization based on the app's specific functionality.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Status Bar -->
  <rect width="360" height="24" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="20" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white">9:41 AM</text>
  <text x="340" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white" text-anchor="end">100%</text>
  
  <!-- Header with Back Button -->
  <rect y="24" width="360" height="56" fill="white"/>
  <text x="60" y="60" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Feature Details</text>
  <circle cx="30" cy="52" r="15" fill="#f5f7fa" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="30" y="57" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">←</text>
  
  <!-- Feature Image/Icon -->
  <rect x="20" y="100" width="320" height="160" rx="10" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  <circle cx="180" cy="180" r="40" fill="#4a90e2" opacity="0.3"/>
  <text x="180" y="190" font-family="Arial" font-size="30" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">📊</text>
  
  <!-- Feature Title and Description -->
  <text x="20" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Feature Title</text>
  <text x="20" y="320" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666">Last updated: Today at 10:30 AM</text>
  
  <rect x="20" y="340" width="320" height="1" fill="#eee"/>
  
  <text x="20" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">
    <tspan x="20" y="370">This is a placeholder for the feature description.</tspan>
    <tspan x="20" y="395">The content here will depend on the specific</tspan>
    <tspan x="20" y="420">functionality of the app. This area can include</tspan>
    <tspan x="20" y="445">text, data visualizations, or other content types.</tspan>
  </text>
  
  <!-- Action Buttons -->
  <rect x="20" y="480" width="155" height="50" rx="25" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="97.5" y="510" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Primary Action</text>
  
  <rect x="185" y="480" width="155" height="50" rx="25" fill="white" stroke="#4a90e2" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text x="262.5" y="510" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">Secondary</text>
  
  <!-- Related Items Section -->
  <text x="20" y="560" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Related Items</text>
  
  <!-- Horizontal Scrollable Items -->
  <rect x="20" y="580" width="100" height="40" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="70" y="605" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Item 1</text>
  
  <rect x="130" y="580" width="100" height="40" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="180" y="605" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Item 2</text>
  
  <rect x="240" y="580" width="100" height="40" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="290" y="605" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Item 3</text>
</svg>
```

## 4. Settings Screen

**Purpose:** The settings screen allows users to configure app preferences and access account-related functions. This design provides a clean, organized layout for various settings categories that can be adapted based on the app's specific requirements.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Status Bar -->
  <rect width="360" height="24" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="20" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white">9:41 AM</text>
  <text x="340" y="17" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white" text-anchor="end">100%</text>
  
  <!-- Header with Back Button -->
  <rect y="24" width="360" height="56" fill="white"/>
  <text x="60" y="60" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Settings</text>
  <circle cx="30" cy="52" r="15" fill="#f5f7fa" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="30" y="57" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">←</text>
  
  <!-- Account Section -->
  <text x="20" y="110" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#999">ACCOUNT</text>
  
  <rect x="20" y="125" width="320" height="60" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="60" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Profile</text>
  <circle cx="35" cy="160" r="10" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="35" y="165" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">👤</text>
  <text x="325" y="160" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">›</text>
  
  <rect x="20" y="190" width="320" height="60" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="60" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Notifications</text>
  <circle cx="35" cy="225" r="10" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="35" y="230" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">🔔</text>
  <text x="325" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">›</text>
  
  <!-- App Preferences Section -->
  <text x="20" y="280" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#999">APP PREFERENCES</text>
  
  <rect x="20" y="295" width="320" height="60" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="60" y="330" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Theme</text>
  <circle cx="35" cy="330" r="10" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="35" y="335" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">🎨</text>
  <text x="325" y="330" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">Light ›</text>
  
  <rect x="20" y="360" width="320" height="60" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="60" y="395" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Language</text>
  <circle cx="35" cy="395" r="10" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="35" y="400" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">🌐</text>
  <text x="325" y="395" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">English ›</text>
  
  <!-- Support Section -->
  <text x="20" y="450" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#999">SUPPORT</text>
  
  <rect x="20" y="465" width="320" height="60" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="60" y="500" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Help Center</text>
  <circle cx="35" cy="500" r="10" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="35" y="505" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">?</text>
  <text x="325" y="500" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">›</text>
  
  <rect x="20" y="530" width="320" height="60" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#eee" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="60" y="565" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">About</text>
  <circle cx="35" cy="565" r="10" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="35" y="570" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">ℹ</text>
  <text x="325" y="565" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">›</text>
  
  <!-- Log Out Button -->
  <rect x="20" y="610" width="320" height="50" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#ff3b30" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="180" y="640" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#ff3b30" text-anchor="middle">Log Out</text>
</svg>
```

## 5. Notification Center Screen

**Purpose:** The notification center provides users with updates and alerts related to their activity within the app. This design offers a clean interface for displaying various types of notifications with timestamps and action options.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Status Bar -->
  <rect width="360" height="24" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="20" y="
